member.name: T:GeeksDirectory.SharedTypes.Responses.AuthTokenResponse
member.summary: If the request for an access token is valid, the authorization server needs to generate an access token (and optional refresh token) and return these to the client, typically along with some additional properties about the authorization

member.name: P:GeeksDirectory.SharedTypes.Responses.AuthTokenResponse.Created
member.summary: Date and time when token has been generated

member.name: P:GeeksDirectory.SharedTypes.Responses.AuthTokenResponse.Type
member.summary: The type of token this is, typically just the string "bearer"

member.name: P:GeeksDirectory.SharedTypes.Responses.AuthTokenResponse.Access
member.summary: The access token string as issued by the authorization server

member.name: P:GeeksDirectory.SharedTypes.Responses.AuthTokenResponse.ExpiresIn
member.summary: f the access token expires, the server should reply with the duration of time the access token is granted for
